data.summary_suggestion: Upload and insert a new creative asset
data.description_suggestion: Uploads and inserts a new creative asset into Campaign Manager 360. Requires the advertiser ID and user profile ID. Accepts a CreativeAssetMetadata object containing asset file properties and metadata. Returns the created CreativeAssetMetadata object with assigned asset ID and upload status. The asset becomes available for use in creatives after successful insertion.
